desc: Visit Neu for the finest collection of handmade rugs and carpets. Enhancing the look of the space with luxurious outdoor rugs, area rugs, bedroom rugs, living room rugs, soft flooring, kilims and a lot more! We hope to enhance the sphere of textile and handloom designing with our products. Best handmade rugs in India!

layout.text: We specialize in top notch quality and we believe in sewing with precision.
